name: Businesseducators
overview:
Business Educators is the first and only online destination dedicated to connecting businesses and professionals with elite corporate education trainers and educational programs. BE innovative Internet resource has been developed for organizations, executive instructors and business schools in need of corporate consulting services, workshops, trainings, lectures and executive development on a top level.

Business Educators was established by Dan Hoeyer, a successful enterpriser and business developer in the sectors of corporate executive education and networking. Dan Hoeyer is co-founder and Chairman of the Board of AVT Business School (www.avt-people.com). This is a privately-owned American Executive business school in Copenhagen, Denmark. Every year AVT provides a minimum of 250 students with CBA and MBA courses, which makes it one of the biggest CBA/MBA education institutes in Denmark.

At present, Business Educators is the first and only online resource providing broad and immediate access to recognized corporate trainers and quality business education programs across a wide variety of topic areas. Business Educators offers a complete and affordable corporate education solution born out of strong industry expertise and backed by modern Internet technology.

Additionally, Business Educators is also designed to help both companies and educator manage all administrative work (organizational issues contracts, documents, etc.). BE handy support services save time and trouble.

At the moment Business Educators offers the following products and services:

Direct Educator Connection: users perform their own searches to find a business educator fitting best their individual needs. If the instructorâ€™s website profile allows a Direct Connection, the client will have immediate access to the educator. If no Direct Connection is available, then BusinessEducators.com manages all the communication.

Business Program: Site visitors look for business education program that has already been implemented by a reputable business trainer. The user will either directly reach the educator associated with the program or contact them through BusinessEducators.com.

Customized Educator Service: Visitors are given the alternative of contacting one of BE highly qualified consultants for assistance in finding the most appropriate corporate education instructor for their specific requirements.
